text: Gɛi gi ga zalaɠa ɠula nuiti, ta Levi nuiti, naa ʋɛɛ nuɓusɛi zɔiti ba, gi yeeɠɛɠalai ɠaaɠwɛɛni gá-ʋɛlɛyeɠeiti ba ga kpakutoomai, gi ɠɛ kwɛ siɛgi nii ɛsɛ maanɛai é ʋaa la ga koʋii ga vebɛanii gá-ƓALA sei ʋɛlɛi ma ɠoizuʋɛ, zalaɠaiti gala vai zu gá-ƓALAGI, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-zalaɠa ɠulazuʋɛ, eɠɛʋelei sɛʋɛai la tɔ sɛʋɛi zu.
